languages.text: Барка про нищие дома жителей Тессеры

traits.locale_text: Барка про нищие дома жителей Тессеры

languages.text: Эти тонущие в зловонной грязи "дома" облепляют друг друга, точно бубоны на теле чумного.

traits.locale_text: Эти тонущие в зловонной грязи "дома" облепляют друг друга, точно бубоны на теле чумного.

languages.text: Half-sunk in malodorous mud, the houses, if one can call them that, are packed together like buboes on a plague-stricken body.
languages.original_text: Эти тонущие в зловонной грязи "дома" облепляют друг друга, точно бубоны на теле чумного.

traits.locale_text: Half-sunk in malodorous mud, the houses, if you can call them that, are packed together like buboes on a plague-stricken body.
Half-sunk in malodorous mud, the houses, if you can call them that, are packed together like buboes on a plague-stricken body.
Half-sunk in malodorous mud, the houses, if you can call them that, are packed together like buboes on a plague-stricken body.
Half-sunk in malodorous mud, the houses, if you can call them that, are packed together like buboes on a plague-stricken body.
Half-sunk in malodorous mud, the houses, if one can call them that, are packed together like buboes on a plague-stricken body.
Half-sunk in malodorous mud, the houses, if one can call them that, are packed together like buboes on a plague-stricken body.

languages.text: 悪臭を放つ泥に半ば沈み込んだ家々―いや、もしそれを「家」と呼べるならの話だが―は、まるで疫病に侵された身体にできた腫れ物のように、ぎゅうぎゅうにひしめき合っている。
languages.original_text: Half-sunk in malodorous mud, the houses, if one can call them that, are packed together like buboes on a plague-stricken body.

traits.locale_text: 悪臭を放つ泥に半ば沈み込んだ家々―いや、もしそれを「家」と呼べるならの話だが―は、まるで疫病に侵された身体にできた腫れ物のように、ぎゅうぎゅうにひしめき合っている。

languages.text: Evler, kokuşmuş çamura yarı gömülmüş hâlde. Hastalıklı bir vücuttaki kabarcıklar gibi sıkış tepişler.
languages.original_text: Half-sunk in malodorous mud, the houses, if one can call them that, are packed together like buboes on a plague-stricken body.

traits.locale_text: Evler kokuşmuş çamura yarı gömülmüş hâlde. Hastalıklı bir vücuttaki kabarcıklar gibi sıkış tepişler.

languages.text: Medio hundidas en el pestilente fango, las casas, por llamarlas de alguna manera, se aglomeran como bubones en el cuerpo de un apestado.
languages.original_text: Half-sunk in malodorous mud, the houses, if one can call them that, are packed together like buboes on a plague-stricken body.

traits.locale_text: Medio hundidas en el pestilente fango, las casas, por llamarlas de alguna manera, se aglomeran como bubones en el cuerpo de un apestado.

languages.text: 这些丑陋的东西或许已经无法称之为“房屋”了。它们半陷在恶臭的淤泥里，挤在一起，仿佛染了瘟疫的人身上的脓疱。
languages.original_text: Half-sunk in malodorous mud, the houses, if one can call them that, are packed together like buboes on a plague-stricken body.

traits.locale_text: 这些丑陋的东西或许已经无法称之为“房屋”了。它们半陷在恶臭的淤泥里，挤在一起，仿佛染了瘟疫的人身上的脓疱。

languages.text: Ensevelies jusqu'à mi-hauteur dans une boue malodorante, les maisons, si tant est qu'on puisse les appeler ainsi, sont entassées les unes contre les autres comme autant de bubons sur le corps d'un pestiféré.
languages.original_text: Half-sunk in malodorous mud, the houses, if one can call them that, are packed together like buboes on a plague-stricken body.

traits.locale_text: Ensevelies jusqu'à mi-hauteur dans une boue malodorante, les maisons, si tant est qu'on puisse les appeler ainsi, sont entassées les unes contre les autres comme autant de bubons sur le corps d'un pestiféré.

languages.text: Die halb in stinkendem Schlamm versunkenen Häuser – sofern man sie als solche bezeichnen kann – gleichen den Pusteln auf einem von der Pest gezeichneten Körper.
languages.original_text: Half-sunk in malodorous mud, the houses, if one can call them that, are packed together like buboes on a plague-stricken body.

traits.locale_text: Die halb in stinkendem Schlamm versunkenen Häuser – sofern man sie als solche bezeichnen kann – gleichen den Pusteln auf einem von der Pest gezeichneten Körper.
